title: Crew Show! (2022 Range Rover, Audi S8, best first sports car, Elon & Twitter)
description:
It's a crew show! Zack is back from the Range Rover launch where he drove 3 models of the new Range. Matt is back from Cabo, and we have an EQS in the garage! We talk about the new Range Rover; the best sports car for a 23 year-old; commuter cars for normal people; manufacturer issues;   and Elon's Twitter bid.

Recorded April 15, 2022

 

Check out Road & Track's Rally U here! https://experiences.roadandtrack.com

Go to blackvue.com/TST to learn more about the BlackVue DR750X-2CH LTE Plus dash cam and BlackVue SIM card. Use the promo code TIRE to get 10% off of any BlackVue dash cam. Free shipping for orders over $200. 

Evercoat Body Shop takes the guesswork out of body work. Available at Advance Auto Part stores. 

LMNT is so sure you will love their product and come back for more they are offering you a free LMNT Sample Pack. That’s 8 single serving packets FREE - Just cover the cost of shipping ($5 for US customers). Get yours at DrinkLMNT.com/TIRE

Want your question answered? To listen to the episode the day it's recorded? Want to watch the live stream, get ad-free podcasts, or exclusive podcasts? Join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast  

Tweet at us! 

https://www.Twitter.com/thesmokingtire 

https://www.Twitter.com/zackklapman 

Instagram:

https://www.Instagram.com/therealzackklapman
